mapper.sql: cusSeq, userId, cusCat, cusTitle, cusContent, TO_CHAR(cusRegDt,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') cusRegDt, cusModId, TO_CHAR(cusRegDt,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') cusModDt, cusReply
